attributes.action: Change legislation in order to prevent the death of innocent children and babies in the future. Lets Protect Children who are truely at risk and not persecute the parents of children who aren't.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have all heard the very harrowing and tragic tale of little baby P, how many more deaths must there be before real changes are made? it's too late for baby P but not for other children in similar situations. In memory of baby P I urge people to sign this petition. People should be held accountable for failing these children.
Better training, better funding and better resources are all needed and accountability for failing these children should be taken.
For children, for justice and for baby P lets ensure this happens no more.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
